Section 6.3b -- 20 days should be changed to 15 days in each location in this section. Section 6.4 --- Needs a lot of explanation. Why is it here? Why would we agree to such? Article 10 - Force Majeure - Need to add Enron language as to items which are not force majeure. Article 11 - Default - Need to add additional Triggering Events, Early Termination, and Termination Damage provisions. Also, need to add provisions for limitation of liability and waiver of consequential damages. Let me know how you would like to proceed.
